List jobs in registry

registry_ls.Rd

Show all jobs stored in the registry with their status and metadata.

Usage

registry_ls(registry = NULL, pattern = NULL, limit = NULL)

Arguments

registry

Path to registry (default: use paths_get("registry"))

pattern

Optional pattern to filter job names

limit

Maximum number of jobs to show

Value

Data frame of jobs

Examples

# \donttest{
# List all jobs
registry_ls()
#>              name      status             created
#> 5 script-d5a2de46 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 23:17:24
#> 6      slurm-call NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 23:17:24
#> 1 parade-591f1e6b NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:58:03
#> 4 parade-b949d01e NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:58:01
#> 2 parade-65fa9a65 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:57:58
#> 3 parade-a704bb5d NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:57:55
#>                                              path
#> 5 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/script-d5a2de46
#> 6      /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/slurm-call
#> 1 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-591f1e6b
#> 4 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-b949d01e
#> 2 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-65fa9a65
#> 3 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-a704bb5d

# List jobs matching pattern
registry_ls(pattern = "analysis_*")
#> No jobs found in registry
#> [1] name    status  created
#> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)

# List most recent 10 jobs
registry_ls(limit = 10)
#>              name      status             created
#> 5 script-d5a2de46 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 23:17:24
#> 6      slurm-call NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 23:17:24
#> 1 parade-591f1e6b NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:58:03
#> 4 parade-b949d01e NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:58:01
#> 2 parade-65fa9a65 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:57:58
#> 3 parade-a704bb5d NO_JOB_FILE 2025-08-31 22:57:55
#>                                              path
#> 5 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/script-d5a2de46
#> 6      /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/slurm-call
#> 1 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-591f1e6b
#> 4 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-b949d01e
#> 2 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-65fa9a65
#> 3 /tmp/Rtmpfb5dkI/parade-registry/parade-a704bb5d
# }
